rulings.text: Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability's targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won't scry.

When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you'll scry last. For others, that means you'll scry and then perform other actions.

rulings.text: If you cast this with Entwine, you don’t get priority in the middle of resolution. You can’t steal something, do anything (like attack with it), and then sacrifice it.

If you choose the “sacrifice a creature” mode, you choose the target of the damage on announcement, but don’t choose what to sacrifice until resolution. You must sacrifice a creature when Grab the Reins resolves, even if you don’t want to. If you don’t control any creatures at that time, Grab the Reins deals no damage.
If you pay the entwine cost, you can sacrifice the creature you gain control of with Grab the Reins.

foreignData.flavorText: ゴブリンの砲手は狙いの正確さで有名なんじゃなく、援護のために飛び込んで来ることで有名だ。
foreignData.name: ゴブリンの大砲
foreignData.text: {2}：クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。ゴブリンの大砲はそれに１点のダメージを与える。ゴブリンの大砲を生け贄に捧げる。

foreignData.flavorText: As equipes de goblins canhoneiros não são conhecidas por sua mira, mas por sua capacidade de encontrar abrigo.
foreignData.name: Canhão dos Goblins
foreignData.text: {2}: Canhão dos Goblins causa 1 ponto de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo. Sacrifique Canhão dos Goblins.

foreignData.flavorText: 精灵炮兵最出名之处，并不是目标瞄得好，而是掩护找得快。
foreignData.name: 精灵大炮
foreignData.text: {2}：精灵大炮对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。牺牲精灵大炮。

mainBoard.name: Goblin Cannon
mainBoard.originalText: {2}: Goblin Cannon deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Sacrifice Goblin Cannon.

rulings.text: You can activate Goblin Cannon’s ability multiple times in response to the first activation. Goblin Cannon will be sacrificed the first time the ability resolves, but each activation still deals damage when it resolves.

mainBoard.text: {2}: Goblin Cannon deals 1 damage to any target. Sacrifice Goblin Cannon.
